translations: 宝贝；亲爱的（对爱人的昵称）

sentences.sentence: All my friends were either lovey-dovey couples or wild, single girls.
sentences.translation: 我所有的朋友不是卿卿我我的情侣，就是狂野的单身女郎。

sentences.sentence: If everyone were gooey and lovey-dovey, it would be an obnoxious world.
sentences.translation: 如果每个人都过分多愁善感、情意绵绵，这将是一个令人讨厌的世界。
